verses.1: Topa in uk hi. Mihonte liing hen. Kherub-te tungah amah tu hi. Leitung liing tahen.
verses.2: Zion khuapi ah Topa lian a, amah in leitung mi khempeuh uk hi.
verses.3: A lian a kihtakhuai ama min mi khempeuh in phat ta uh hen. Amah siangtho hi.
verses.4: Thutang a deih, Vanglian Kumpipa aw, nangmah in thuman na phut khin a, Israel-te sungah thutang le thuman na sem khia hi.
verses.5: I Topa Pasian phat unla, ama khengakna munah bia un. Amah siangtho hi.
verses.6: Moses le Aaron ama siampi hi uh a, amah a biate lakah Samuel zong a kihel hi. Topaʼ tungah amaute kiko uh a, amah in amaute a dawng hi.
verses.7: Amah in meii khuampi sung pan amaute tungah thu gen a, ama teci pannate le amah in amaute tungah a thukham piakte amaute in a zui uh hi.
verses.8: Koteʼ Topa Pasian aw, nang in amaute na dawng hi. Amauʼ mawhna hangin gim na piak tei hangin amauʼ mawhnate a maisak nuam Pasian na hihna amauteʼ tungah na kilangsak hi.
verses.9: I Topa Pasian phat unla, ama mual siangtho ah bia un; bang hang hiam cih leh i Topa Pasian a siangtho hi.
